triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: LLMs are the core technology that autonomous agents are built upon and leverage for reasoning and task completion.

triples.name: Autonomous agent
triples.relevance: The survey focuses on autonomous agents that operate independently to achieve goals in various domains.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: LLM-based agents utilize NLP techniques to understand and generate human language for interaction and reasoning.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: Machine learning is the foundational paradigm that enables training and optimization of LLMs used in autonomous agents.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: A key technique for training agents to make sequential decisions and optimize rewards in complex environments.

triples.name: Prompt engineering
triples.relevance: Essential technique for guiding LLM-based agents to perform specific tasks through carefully crafted instructions.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The overarching field encompassing autonomous agents and their applications across various domains.
